item.title: Little Witch in the Woods for PC launches September 4
item.content:encoded:
• PC

Currently in Early Access.

Witch life simulation game Little Witch in the Woods will leave Early Access and launch for PC via Steam on September 4, developer SUNNY SIDE UP announced. The price will increase with the full release.

Little Witch in the Woods first launched in Early Access / Game Preview for Xbox One and PC via Steam and Microsoft Store on May 17, 2022. SUNNY SIDE UP told Gematsu the September 4 release date is only for the Steam PC version.

The version 1.0 release will include a new theme, unrepaired areas of the village, new villagers, various new stories, new features, quality-of-life improvements, optimizations, bug fixes, and more.

“Thanks to all the interest, support, and feedback you’ve given us, we’ve made it to the full release,” SUNNY SIDE UP said in a statement. “We’ve worked hard to bring fun and joy to players. We hope you’ll enjoy the daily life of a witch in the world of Little Witch in the Woods. We’ll continue to do our best. Thank you.”
